snippet: Two armed gangs killed four rhinoceroses for their horns in rural Kenya this week in possibly the worst rhino poaching incident in the country in more than 25 years.
abstract: Kenya Wildlife Service says two armed gangs killed four rhinoceroses for their horns in rural Kenya, in possibly the worst rhino poaching incident in the country in more than 25 years.
lead_paragraph: Two armed gangs killed four rhinoceroses for their horns in rural Kenya this week in possibly the worst rhino poaching incident in the country in more than 25 years.
